items.title: Photography
items.description: Capturing moments and emotions with a Sony A6400 and Sigma 18-50mm lens, unlocking creativity and new perspectives.

items.title: 3D Printing
items.description: Transforming ideas into reality with the Bambu A1 Mini, enhancing electrical projects with custom designs.

items.title: Hiking
items.description: Pushing limits and embracing challenges with hikes like Fansipan (Vietnam), Roys Peak (New Zealand), and Mount Batur (Bali).
